gml:TimeCoordinateSystem.gml:description: Describes the origin and units (Ka) used to define geological numeric time in thousands of years, measured as an increasing number of years before 1950

gml:descriptionReference.xlink:title: Gradstein, F.M., Ogg, J.G. and Smith, A.G., 2004. A Geologic Time Scale 2004, Cambridge Universtity Press. ISBN 0-521-78142-6

gml:TimeCoordinateSystem.gml:name: Standard Geological Numerical Temporal Reference Frame (Ka)
